org.kordamp.ezmorph

Class MorphUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kordamp.ezmorph.MorphUtils

  • public class MorphUtils
extends Object
    Covenient class for registering standard morphers to a ConvertRegistry.
    Author:
    Andres Almiray
